SELECT WF_PROCESS.*, (CASE WHEN WF_PROCESS.PiBusinessState = '02_02_' OR WF_PROCESS.PiBusinessState = '02_01_' THEN WF_PROCESS.PiBusinessState ELSE '-' END )AS BusinessState FROM ( SELECT Subject AS Subject , form.FormName , FI.FormInstID , InitiatorName AS InitiatorName , InitiatorID AS InitiatorID , InitiatorUnitID AS InitiatorUnitID , InitiatorUnitName AS InitiatorUnitName , FI.ProcessID AS PiID , P.ProcessState AS PiState , SUBSTR(P.BusinessState,1,6) AS PiBusinessState , P.BusinessState AS DocBusinessState , DocNo AS DocNo , InitiatedDate AS WorkDt , FormPrefix , FI.EntCode as EntCode, FI.ProcessID AS ProcessID, CompletedDate , P.ProcessState as ProcessState, InitiatedDate, P.BusinessData1, P.BusinessData2 FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_forminstance AS FI INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.ProcessID, A.ProcessState, A.BusinessState, B.BusinessData1, B.BusinessData2 FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_process AS A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_ProcessDescription AS B ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = B.ProcessDescriptionID )P ON P.ProcessID = FI.ProcessID INNER JOIN covi_approval4j.jwf_forms as form on FI.formid = form.formid )WF_PROCESS
WHERE 1=1 AND IFNULL(BusinessData1, 'APPROVLAL') = 'APPROVAL'
AND EntCode = #{selectEntinfoListData}
AND CompletedDate BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{StartDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{EndDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND ProcessState = 528 AND DocBusinessState LIKE '02_01%'
CompletedDate DESC

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID();

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_pdfconvert_history C
AND
C.FormPrefix C.TaskID C.Subject C.FormInstID C.Subject
like CONCAT('%',#{SearchText},'%')
AND ConvertStartTime between #{StartDate} and #{EndDate}

SELECT C.HistoryID , C.State , C.TaskID , C.ErrorStackTrace , C.FormPrefix , C.FormInstID , C.UserCode , DU.MultiDisplayName AS UserName , C.Subject , C.ConvertStartTime , C.ConvertEndTime , C.RegisterCode , U.MultiDisplayName AS RegisterName , C.RegistDate , FI.ProcessID FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_pdfconvert_history C LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user U ON U.UserCode = C.RegisterCode LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user DU ON DU.UserCode = C.UserCode LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_approval4j.jwf_forminstance FI ON FI.FormInstID = C.FormInstID
AND
C.FormPrefix C.TaskID C.Subject C.FormInstID C.Subject
like CONCAT('%',#{SearchText},'%')
AND ConvertStartTime between #{StartDate} and #{EndDate}
RegistDate ConvertEndTime TaskID RegistDate
ASC DESC
HistoryID DESC
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageOffset}
